scene_description_enriched: The image displays a heraldic shield, emblazoned with three golden fleur-de-lis on a blue background. Above the shield is a red cardinal's hat, from which red cords with tassels hang down on either side of the shield. The overall presentation suggests a coat of arms, likely belonging to a high-ranking ecclesiastic or a noble family with royal connections, given the fleur-de-lis motif.
